title: X-Men - The Ages of Apocalypse Storyline
description:
Following the events of"The Twelve" storyline, Apocalypse finds himself trapped in the body of Scott Summers (Cyclops of X-Men) after a failed attempt to possess Nate Grey. Using his newfound powers, Apocalypse warps reality several times, trying to get the Twelve to feed him more and more power. "The Ages of Apocalypse" arc is mainly an exploration of the trapped heroes finding a way out of those alternative reality warps.

Reading Order:

Uncanny X-Men #378
Cable v2 #77
Wolverine v2 #148
X-Men Unlimited #26
X-Men #98 

Also included is the follow-up mini-series X-Men: The Search for Cyclops.

This storyline is not to be confused with the 1995-1996 crossover event Age of Apocalypse.


Released on http://ComicPirates.info
